definitions.definition: a person engaged or learned in philosophy, especially as an academic discipline.
examples: thinker, theorist, theorizer, theoretician, metaphysicist, metaphysician; Morescholar, intellectual, sage, wise man "when I was young, I failed to appreciate what an insightful philosopher my father was"Morescholar, intellectual, sage, wise man when I was young, I failed to appreciate what an insightful philosopher my father was
